Text:
why are u doing thus? Youre just destroing whats dpkg is!
everyone knows this is free software, debian users can get it (and it will automaticly update) from dpkg!
fuck this torrent!
It's available via apt-get ? What a DICK!

Personally, I think it's nice people are seeding open-source software. It *can* make getting newer software easier. So for all of you who are pissed someone is providing this torrent or others like it, fuck off.
